functionDecorators.name: create
functionDecorators.description: Creates a SetToken smart contract and registers the SetToken with the controller. The SetTokens are composed of positions that are instantiated as DEFAULT (positionState = 0) state.

parameterDecorators.name: _components
parameterDecorators.description: List of addresses of components for initial Positions.

parameterDecorators.name: _units
parameterDecorators.description: List of units. Each unit is the # of components per 10^18 of a SetToken.

parameterDecorators.name: _modules
parameterDecorators.description: List of modules to enable. All modules must be approved by the Controller.

returnDecorators.description: address Address of the newly created SetToken.
